# Template Overview

NetPad provides **100+ professionally designed form templates** to help you get started quickly. Templates are pre-configured forms with fields, validation rules, and best practices already set up for common use cases.

## Why Use Templates?

| Benefit | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Speed** | Get started in minutes instead of hours |
| **Best Practices** | Templates follow industry standards |
| **Learning Tool** | See how experienced users structure forms |
| **Fully Customizable** | Edit everything after applying a template |

## Template Categories

Templates are organized into 14 categories covering common business needs:

| Category | Examples | Templates |
|----------|----------|-----------|
| **Business & Sales** | Contact forms, lead capture, quotes | 10+ |
| **Healthcare** | Patient intake, medical history, appointments | 7+ |
| **HR & Recruitment** | Job applications, onboarding, time off | 8+ |
| **Finance** | Expense reports, invoices, budgets | 6+ |
| **Education** | Course enrollment, evaluations | 5+ |
| **Events** | Registration, RSVPs, ticketing | 6+ |
| **Feedback & Surveys** | NPS, CSAT, product feedback | 8+ |
| **Customer Service** | Help desk, bug reports, feature requests | 6+ |
| **E-commerce** | Order forms, returns, inquiries | 5+ |
| **Real Estate** | Property inquiries, rental applications | 6+ |
| **Legal** | Client intake, NDAs, contracts | 4+ |
| **Nonprofit** | Donations, volunteer signup, grants | 5+ |
| **Marketing** | Newsletter signup, webinar registration | 6+ |
| **Operations & IT** | IT requests, incident reports, assets | 6+ |

## Complexity Levels

Each template is rated by complexity to help you choose the right starting point:

- **Simple** — 5-10 fields, basic structure, ~2 min to customize
- **Moderate** — 10-15 fields, may include conditional logic, ~5 min to customize
- **Advanced** — 15+ fields, multi-page wizards, complex validation, ~10 min to customize

## Encryption & Compliance

Templates in healthcare, finance, and HR categories include pre-configured encryption indicators for sensitive fields:

| Framework | Use Case |
|-----------|----------|
| **HIPAA** | Healthcare data (PHI) |
| **PCI-DSS** | Payment/financial data |
| **GDPR** | EU personal data |
| **SOC2** | Security audits |

:::tip
Encryption must be configured separately. See [Encryption Documentation](../security/encryption.md) for setup instructions.
:::
